lockPairWarning.text:
Trading for the selected pair is temporarily unavailable. 
You can still cancel orders if you wish

slides.description: Faça parte desta comunidade em grande expansão no mundo das criptomoedas. Você é a única pessoa que pode acessar suas criptomoedas.
slides.title: Vamos iniciar no Blockchain

slides.description: Armazene, gerencie e receba juros sobre seu saldo de ativos digitais, de forma fácil e segura.
slides.title: Carteira

slides.description: Negocie com rapidez e segurança. Você mantém o controle total sobre seus fundos ao negociá-los em nossa exchange descentralizada.
slides.title: Exchange Descentralizada

slides.description: Crie seus próprios tokens. Eles podem ser integrados à sua empresa, não apenas como uma moeda interna, mas também como um token para votação descentralizada, como um sistema de classificação ou programa de fidelidade.
slides.title: Criar Token

openViaDesktop: Desejo abrir os links através do aplicativo Desktop

aug2019.text: Traders can sell tokens quickly at market price.
aug2019.title: Market order

dec2018.text: The new mobile app offers a fantastic DEX UI and gateway integration.
dec2018.text_2: Tickers and logos on DEX show approved assets, giving users a high degree of confidence.
dec2018.title: Mobile app 2.0

feb2017.text: The first version of the flagship built-in exchange is launched.
feb2017.title: Waves DEX Beta

feb2018.text: The standalone Client for macOS, Linux and Windows is released.
feb2018.title: Desktop app

jan2019.text: Support for trading on Waves DEX with Smart Accounts is enabled.
jan2019.text_2: Launch of Bitcoin Satoshi Vision gateway
jan2019.title: Smart Account Trading

jul2018.text: The relaunched exchange offers a better UX and performance than any other DEX on the market.
jul2018.text_2: The popular wallet comes out of beta with a major new release.
jul2018.title: Nova DEX

jul2019.text: Addition of ERC20 token gateway to the Waves ecosystem, meaning that popular Ethereum tokens can be traded on the platform.
jul2019.text_2: Developers have simplified mobile development processes and gain comprehensive descriptions for means of interacting with the Waves blockchain.
jul2019.text_3: Users have the ability to switch easily between multiple accounts within one wallet app.
jul2019.title: Gateway ERC-20
jul2019.title_2: Mobile SDK and JS library improvement

jun2019.text: Improvements in DEX speed and memory requirements to be implemented.
jun2019.title: DEX optimisation

may2018.text: The relaunched exchange offers a better UX and performance than any other DEX on the market.
may2018.title: Dash & Bitcoin Cash gateways

nov2018.text: Users gain the ability to trade with multi-signature and scripted accounts.
nov2018.title: Smarts Account Support

sep2018.text: Integration with Waves DEX enables users to trade with maximum security.
sep2018.title: Ledger Nano S

sep2019.text: Two factor authentication gives Waves DEX users even greater security.
sep2019.title: 2FA

welcome.broughtBy: Brought to you by Waves Team
welcome.contestLinkDescription: Win 5,000 WAVES in a trading contest on Waves DEX!
welcome.controlAssets: Control of assets is yours alone – funds do not leave your wallet and cannot be frozen
welcome.dexWithHardware: Use DEX with hardware wallets Ledger Nano S and Ledger Blue
welcome.getRealTimeAccess: Get real-time access to market data and set up your trading bots via API
welcome.inputErrorNameExists: That name is taken. Try another
welcome.instantAccessWalletDex: Instant access to your wallet and DEX
welcome.majorFiatCryptocurrencies: Major fiat and cryptocurrencies supported: BTC, LTC, ETH, USD, and others
welcome.marketsDescription: Waves DEX allows you to execute trades swiftly and securely, regardless of whether you’re trading via mobile app, desktop client, web wallet or the Waves API.
welcome.marketsTableDescription: To view more traded pairs click
welcome.name: Name
welcome.roadmapOpportunitiesAhead: The future of Waves DEX: our roadmap for the opportunities ahead.
welcome.tokenCreationCosts: Token creation costs just 1 WAVES and takes 1 minute
welcome.tokenomicaToasterText: Torne-se acionista da primeira tudo-em-um plataforma para emissão e negociação secundária de ativos tokenizados
welcome.tradeOnWaves: Trade on the Waves Decentralised Exchange
welcome.tradeOnWavesDescription: Buy and sell tokens quickly and securely with all advantages of a centralised exchange, but retaining complete control of your funds.
